Text: Invitation to an Executive BreakfastMr Skilling Your executive assistant suggested that I email you with my request I am a partner of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP located in Calgary Alberta On a recent flight on United Airlines I read with great interest the article in Uniteds inflight magazine about what you did at Enron with regard to convergence To say the least I was impressed Many of our clients in the Calgary particularly in the Energy Industry are dealing with the concept of convergence The purpose of this email is to ask if you would be a guest speaker at one of our Executive Breakfasts PwC Calgary holds three to four Executive Breakfasts each year which usually has about CEOs CFOs attending We hold these sessions at the Palliser Hotel and they do a great job in having an upscale event I sincerely believe your Enron story will interest many of our energy clients and nonclients I would be pleased to discuss this further at your convenience You have my email address or I can be reached at my Calgary office or residence Best regards Dennis J Hoffman The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
